title: Helping you to help your child
creator_credit: Bill Cole and New Zealand Council for Educational Research
brief_description: Contains four sequences intended to introduce parents to the essential features to be observed in tutoring their children. The advice given is directed towards parents with older children having reading difficulties. The procedures suggested are not intended as a basis for tutoring younger children learning to read in a regular school program.
